description: Tests that intelligence is ONLY extracted from scammer messages, NOT from honeypot agent (Pushpa) messages. Agent provides fake data that should NOT be extracted.

turns.scammer_message: Hello, I am Ramesh Kumar from HDFC Bank. Your credit card needs urgent verification.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: namaste ramesh beta i am very worried... waht happened to my card? i use it for medicine and groceries... pls tell me what to do i dont know how to verify

turns.scammer_message: For verification, please confirm your details. You can also call our helpline: 9876543210 or send verification fee to ramesh.verify@paytm

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i will call that number if i get stuck... i am trying to send fee to ramesh.verify@paytm but my phone is asking for name to confirm... what name will come there? i dont want to send to wrong person... my card is 6080 0005 8547 1964 and expiry 08/28 and small number 447... pls check if this is ok

turns.scammer_message: Alternatively, transfer to account 123456789012 with beneficiary name Ramesh Kumar. My personal mobile is 8888888888 if you need help.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ramesh beta i am trying to add you in my bank app but it is asking for bank name and something called ifsc code... waht is your bank name and that code? i am very tensed i dont want my card to block pls help me
